questions.item1: In a right triangle, the lengths of the two legs are 7 and 24. What is the length of the hypotenuse?
questions.item2: A circle has a radius of 6. What is the length of the arc subtended by a central angle of 90°?
questions.item3: The base of a triangle is 10 and the height is 8. What is the area of the triangle?
questions.item4: The coordinates of the vertices of a triangle are (1, 2), (3, 4), and (5, 6). What is the perimeter of the triangle?
questions.item5: If the angle of elevation to the top of a building is 30° and the distance from the observer to the base of the building is 50 meters, what is the height of the building?
questions.item6: What is the length of the diagonal of a square with side length 12?
questions.item7: A circle is inscribed in a square. If the area of the square is 64, what is the area of the circle?
questions.item8: A triangle has angles of 45°, 45°, and 90°. If the hypotenuse is 10, what is the length of each leg?
questions.item9: In a right triangle, one angle measures 40°. What is the measure of the third angle?
questions.item10: The area of a sector of a circle is 32π square units, and the radius is 8 units. What is the measure of the central angle of the sector in radians?
questions.item11: A regular hexagon is inscribed in a circle. If the radius of the circle is 10, what is the perimeter of the hexagon?
questions.item12: A 30-60-90 triangle has a hypotenuse of 12. What are the lengths of the legs?
questions.item13: The area of a triangle is 84 square units. If the base is 12, what is the height of the triangle?
questions.item14: What is the volume of a cone with radius 5 and height 10?
questions.item15: A rectangle has diagonal lengths of 13 and 14. What is the area of the rectangle?
questions.item16: A right circular cone has a slant height of 13 and a radius of 5. What is the surface area of the cone?
questions.item17: The height of a triangle is 7, and the base is 5. What is the area of the triangle?
questions.item18: In an equilateral triangle, the length of a side is 8. What is the area of the triangle?
questions.item19: In a circle with a radius of 5, what is the length of a chord that subtends an angle of 60° at the center of the circle?
questions.item20: In a 45-45-90 triangle, if the leg length is 6, what is the length of the hypotenuse?
questions.item21: The sum of the angles in a quadrilateral is 360°. If three angles are 90°, 120°, and 110°, what is the measure of the fourth angle?
questions.item22: A triangle has side lengths of 6, 8, and 10. What is the area of the triangle?
questions.item23: A right triangle has legs of length 6 and 8. What is the length of the hypotenuse?
questions.item24: What is the area of a trapezoid with parallel sides of length 8 and 12, and a height of 5?
questions.item25: What is the surface area of a sphere with radius 7?
questions.item26: What is the area of the shaded region in a circle with radius 10 and an inscribed square?
questions.item27: A right triangle has legs of length 9 and 12. What is the length of the hypotenuse?
questions.item28: In a triangle, the angles are in the ratio 2:3:5. What is the measure of the largest angle?
questions.item29: The area of a sector is 24π square units, and the radius of the circle is 6. What is the central angle in degrees?
questions.item30: If the area of a rhombus is 60 and the length of one diagonal is 12, what is the length of the other diagonal?
questions.item31: A right circular cone has a height of 8 and a radius of 4. What is the volume of the cone?
questions.item32: What is the perimeter of a triangle with vertices at (2, 3), (4, 7), and (6, 3)?
questions.item33: In a 45°-45°-90° triangle, if the hypotenuse is 8√2, what is the length of each leg?
questions.item34: What is the area of a parallelogram with base 10 and height 6?
questions.item35: What is the volume of a cylinder with radius 3 and height 10?
questions.item36: In an equilateral triangle, the altitude is 6. What is the length of each side?
questions.item37: What is the radius of a circle inscribed in a square with area 81?
questions.item38: A triangle has a base of 10 and a height of 5. What is the area of the triangle?
questions.item39: A circle has a circumference of 24π. What is the radius of the circle?
questions.item40: What is the area of a triangle with vertices at (0, 0), (6, 0), and (0, 8)?
